org.trianacode.gui.hci.tools

Class TaskGraphViewManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.gui.hci.tools.TaskGraphViewManager

  • public class TaskGraphViewManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The TaskGraphViewManager maintains the current view for each taskgraph and returns the appropriate tree icon, workspace popup, tool component based on that mode. The TaskGraphViewManager also maintains the default view keyed by taskgraph tool class.

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultTaskgraphView

        public static TaskGraphView getDefaultTaskgraphView()
        Returns:
        the default taskgraph view

      • setDefaultTaskGraphView

        public static void setDefaultTaskGraphView(TaskGraphView view)
        Sets the default taskgraph view

      • registerTaskGraphView

        public static void registerTaskGraphView(java.lang.String toolclass,
                         TaskGraphView view)
        Registers a TaskGraphView for a particular taskgraph tool clas. Note that if a taskgraph has two view then the later registered takes precedence. Automatically adds the view to the available views list.

      • unregisterTaskGraphView

        public static void unregisterTaskGraphView(java.lang.String toolclass)
        Unregisters the TaskGraphView for a particular taskgraph tool class. Note that this method does not automatically remove the mode from the available views list, use removeTaskGraphView.

      • addTaskGraphView

        public static void addTaskGraphView(TaskGraphView view)
        Adds the taskgraph view to the available views list

      • removeTaskGraphView

        public static void removeTaskGraphView(TaskGraphView view)
        Removes the taskgraph view from the available views list

      • getTaskGraphViews

        public static TaskGraphView[] getTaskGraphViews()
        Returns:
        a list of the taskgraph views

      • setTaskGraphView

        public void setTaskGraphView(TaskGraph taskgraph,
                    TaskGraphView view)
        Explicitally sets the view for the specified taskgraph

      • clearTaskGraphView

        public void clearTaskGraphView(TaskGraph taskgraph)
        Returns the view for the specified taskgraph to the default

        Returns the current view for the specified taskgraph

                   java.lang.String action)
        Parameters:
        action - the update action (e.g. INCREASE_INPUT_NODES_ACTION as defined in UpdateActionConstants)
        Returns:
        true if the update action icon should be shown for the specified action
